Package model.node

Class ArpTable

java.lang.Object
model.node.ArpTable
public class ArpTable extends Object
Class representing an ARP table. Each node must have an ARP table.
See Also:
  • Node
  • MacAddress
  • IpAddress

    Construct a new APR table

  • Constructor Details

    • ArpTable

      public ArpTable()
      Construct a new APR table

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(IpAddress ipAddress, MacAddress macAddress)
      Add a new entry in the ARP table. Raise an exception if IP address is already in the map
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP address
      macAddress - Corresponding MAC address

    • updateEntry

      public void updateEntry(IpAddress ipAddress, MacAddress macAddress)
      Update entry in the ARP table. Raise an exception if IP address is not in the map
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP address
      macAddress - Corresponding MAC address

    • deleteEntry

      public void deleteEntry(IpAddress ipAddress)
      Remove an entry from the table. It must be in the table.
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP destination to remove

    • flush

      public void flush()
      Remove all the entries from the table

    • getEntry

      public MacAddress getEntry(IpAddress ipAddress)
      Get the MAC address corresponding to the IP address
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP address
      Returns:
      The associated MAC address, or null if no such key

    • hasEntry

      public boolean hasEntry(IpAddress ipAddress)
      Indicates if IP address is in this table
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP address to check
      Returns:
      True if IP address is in table, False otherwise
